snippet.title: Need for Speed: ProStreet - Pepega Edition | Car Audio Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Let's kick off the new year with something special! We hope you'll enjoy this Car Sound Showcase of the upcoming Pepega Mod! 🚗🔊💥
Learn more about the next Pepega Mod on our Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/YbFadBv

Timestamps:
0:00 Introduction
0:23 Audi S3
1:32 Honda Civic CX Hatchback
2:35 Ford Escort RS Cosworth
3:42 Acura RSX
4:52 Nissan Skyline GT-R R34
6:11 Porsche 911 GT3 RS
7:32 Pagani Zonda F
8:48 Lamborghini Murcielago LP640
10:11 Endcard
-----------------------------------------
The next Pepega Mod will be coming to NFS ProStreet in 2022! 
Race your way through all-new race organizations and kings on completely redone tracks and locations! Move your way up from shitboxes and meme-cars to modern classics and concept cars!  Dominate new Race Days featuring completely new event types on your way to become the Pepega King!

• Revamped Career Mode featuring new Kings, Races and Organizations
• Over 100 Customizable Cars - from Shitboxes to Concept Cars - featuring the beloved Autosculpt and full-fledged damage models
• Improved Graphics through better reflections, colors and more
• New Event Types, such as Sprint Run: Try to get the best time on a short sprint over the course of three runs!
• Redesigned Engine Sounds and new Announcers
• New Tuning Options, such a Drivetrain Swaps - now any car can pull off a wheelie!
• Major improvements to handling, balancing and bug fixes
-----------------------------------------
Pepega Edition Merch: https://www.redbubble.com/people/TeamPepega/shop?asc=u
Download & More Info : https://pepegamod.com/
-----------------------------------------
Video Credits:
19Bozzy92
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ueaHyeAi3M
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bzd-ggV5mKA
AutomotiveCulture - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qtql1qyvNc
BerlinTomek - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pw0nFoEW2bc
Lue Detailing - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F7BJ8xH6PdE
nicolaslemarseillais - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z68m7cvecZI
Qayfneqif - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7zvA9MQIwE
Zsinor Motors - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VU-Ik-i8Kp8&t=35s
